How many people are affected by Li-Fraumeni syndrome ?,The exact prevalence of Li-Fraumeni is unknown. One U.S. registry of Li-Fraumeni syndrome patients suggests that about 400 people from 64 families have this disorder.,GHR,Li-Fraumeni syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Li-Fraumeni syndrome ?,"The CHEK2 and TP53 genes are associated with Li-Fraumeni syndrome.  More than half of all families with Li-Fraumeni
